Texts.Chs: 把^green;10份硅^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;10 silicon^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 激动人心的结果！用其他材料，如木材，泥土，石头等，重复试验同样的事情...天呐，几乎任何东西都行。如果你尝试了，你会发现各种各样的新东西！
Texts.Eng: Encouraging results! Try the same thing with other materials such as wood, dirt, stone...heck, almost anything really. You'll find all sorts of things if you just give it a try!

Texts.Chs: 有了^orange;研磨机^reset;，你很快就可以第一次开始你的各种新创作了。试着弄来50份^orange;沙子^reset;并萃取出一些^orange;硅^reset;
Texts.Eng: With a ^orange;Hand Mill^reset; you can start cutting your teeth on all sorts of new creations. Try getting at least 50 ^orange;Sand^reset; and extracting it to get some ^orange;Silicon^reset;.
